STAY CONNECTED <http://www.facebook.com/pages/Tritech-Software-Systems/89416081839> Technology Seminar: Data Sharing and Integrated Justice
Hello {{lead.First Name:default=Sir/Madam}},
We hope that you will join us and fellow leaders in Public Safety where we will discuss solutions for Data Sharing and Integrated Justice.
Hosted by Microsoft and TriTech Software Systems, you will hear from industry experts on how to easily achieve goals of data sharing and building an integrated justice system through:
- Sharing crime data with other departments and neighboring agencies - Near real-time Google-like investigative search capabilities and alert notifications - Dashboards and reporting tools for real-time performance indicators and trending statistics - Near-sourcing IT infrastructure needs - Improving connectivity with your wireless solution - RMS Analytics and mobile applications - Business continuity and high availability - Flexible, cost-effective financing solutions
